results.content: He is very verbose. I feel like the content is good but it's taking him twice as long to get to the salient points as is required. I've had it on 2x speed and I'm still annoyed at the amount of filler and back peddling he is doing.
results.content_html: He is very verbose. I feel like the content is good but it's taking him twice as long to get to the salient points as is required. I've had it on 2x speed and I'm still annoyed at the amount of filler and back peddling he is doing.
